description: Searches for related items that are associated with a case.

parameters.name: caseId
parameters.description: A unique identifier of the case.

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Cases domain.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: The list of types of related items and their parameters to use for filtering. (dict) --- The list of types of related items and their parameters to use for filtering. comment (dict) --- A filter for related items of type Comment. contact (dict) --- A filter for related items of type Contact. channel (list) --- A list of channels to filter on for related items of type Contact. (string) --- contactArn (string) --- A unique identifier of a contact in Amazon Connect. file (dict) --- A filter for related items of this type of File. fileArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the file. sla (dict) --- Filter for related items of type SLA. name (string) --- Name of an SLA. status (string) --- Status of an SLA.

nested_params.name: comment
nested_params.description: A filter for related items of type Comment.

nested_params.name: contact
nested_params.description: A filter for related items of type Contact.

nested_params.name: channel
nested_params.description: A list of channels to filter on for related items of type Contact.

nested_params.name: contactArn
nested_params.description: A unique identifier of a contact in Amazon Connect.

nested_params.name: file
nested_params.description: A filter for related items of this type of File.

nested_params.name: fileArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the file.

nested_params.name: sla
nested_params.description: Filter for related items of type SLA.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. This is null if there are no more results to return.

nested_items.name: relatedItems
nested_items.description: A list of items related to a case.

nested_items.name: associationTime
nested_items.description: Time at which a related item was associated with a case.

nested_items.name: body
nested_items.description: Text in the body of a Comment on a case.

nested_items.name: contentType
nested_items.description: Type of the text in the box of a Comment on a case.

nested_items.name: channel
nested_items.description: A list of channels to filter on for related items of type Contact.

nested_items.name: connectedToSystemTime
nested_items.description: The difference between the InitiationTimestamp and the DisconnectTimestamp of the contact.

nested_items.name: contactArn
nested_items.description: A unique identifier of a contact in Amazon Connect.

nested_items.name: fileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a File in Amazon Connect.

nested_items.name: slaConfiguration
nested_items.description: Represents an SLA configuration.

nested_items.name: completionTime
nested_items.description: Time at which an SLA was completed.

nested_items.name: fieldId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier of a field.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name of an SLA.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Status of an SLA.

nested_items.name: targetFieldValues
nested_items.description: Represents a list of target field values for the fieldId specified in SlaConfiguration.

nested_items.name: booleanValue
nested_items.description: Can be either null, or have a Boolean value type. Only one value can be provided.

nested_items.name: doubleValue
nested_items.description: Can be either null, or have a Double number value type. Only one value can be provided.

nested_items.name: emptyValue
nested_items.description: An empty value.

nested_items.name: stringValue
nested_items.description: String value type.

nested_items.name: userArnValue
nested_items.description: Represents the user that performed the audit.

nested_items.name: targetTime
nested_items.description: Target time by which an SLA should be completed.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Type of SLA.

nested_items.name: performedBy
nested_items.description: Represents the creator of the related item.

nested_items.name: customEntity
nested_items.description: Any provided entity.

nested_items.name: userArn
nested_items.description: Represents the Amazon Connect ARN of the user.

nested_items.name: relatedItemId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier of a related item.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Type of a related item.
